content:
The following link might be helpful: Unified View seems empty? https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1516020#answer-1740501

The above link talks about how to make messages in a folder appear in Unified Inbox: Tick "Unify (All messages are shown in Unified Inbox)" to make the messages in a folder appear in Unified Inbox.

When you know how to make messages in a folder appear in Unified Inbox, you should know how to make messages in a folder not appear in Unified Inbox: Untick "Unify (All messages are shown in Unified Inbox)" to make the messages in a folder not appear in Unified Inbox.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
